Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: update EWA_ADMIN SET ADM_PWD=@ADM_PWD, ADM_MDATE=@SYS_DATE WHERE ADM_ID=@ADM_ID

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT ADM_NAME,ADM_LID FROM EWA_ADMIN WHERE ADM_ID=@ADM_ID

Set.Top: <button onclick="AddNew()">添加</button> <button onclick="Delete()">删除</button> | <button onclick="Deny(false)">启用</button> <button onclick="Deny(true)" >禁用</button> | <input type=radio name=t value="" onclick='Show(this)' checked> 全部 <input type=radio name=t value="Y" onclick='Show(this)'> 禁用 <input type=radio name=t value="N" onclick='Show(this)'> 启用 <hr />

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM EWA_ADMIN WHERE (@ADM_DENY='' or @ADM_DENY is null) or ADM_DENY=@ADM_DENY

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: DELETE FROM EWA_ADMIN WHERE (ADM_ID>0) AND (ADM_ID =@ADM_ID or ADM_ID IN (@IDS_SPLIT))

Set.Name: 禁用
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_ADMIN SET ADM_DENY='Y' WHERE ADM_ID>0 AND ADM_ID IN (@IDS_SPLIT)

Set.Name: 启用
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_ADMIN SET ADM_DENY='N' WHERE ADM_ID>0 AND ADM_ID IN (@IDS_SPLIT)
SELECT * FROM EWA_DENY WHERE 1=1

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM EWA_GROUP WHERE GRP_ID = @GRP_ID

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_GROUP SET GRP_NAME = @GRP_NAME, GRP_MEMO = @GRP_MEMO, GRP_DENY = @GRP_DENY, GRP_MDATE=@SYS_DATE WHERE GRP_ID = @GRP_ID AND GRP_ID>0
SELECT * FROM EWA_DENY WHERE 1=1

Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM EWA_DENY WHERE 1=1

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO EWA_FUNCTION (FUN_NAME, FUN_TYPE, FUN_XML, FUN_ITEM, FUN_URL, FUN_MEMO, FUN_DENY,fun_cdate) VALUES ( @FUN_NAME, @FUN_TYPE, @FUN_XML, @FUN_ITEM, @FUN_URL, @FUN_MEMO, @FUN_DENY,@sys_date)

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM EWA_FUNCTION WHERE 1=1

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: DELETE FROM EWA_FUNCTION WHERE FUN_ID = @FUN_ID or fun_id in (@ids_split)

Set.Name: 禁用
Set.Sql: update EWA_FUNCTION set fun_deny=@deny,fun_mdate=@sys_date where fun_id in (@ids_split)

Set.Name: 通过功能树调用
Set.Sql: SELECT a.* FROM EWA_FUNCTION a ,EWA_R_FT_FUNC b WHERE a.fun_id=b.fun_id and b.ft_id=@ft_id
SELECT * FROM EWA_FUNC_TYPE WHERE 1=1
SELECT * FROM EWA_DENY WHERE 1=1

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
OnAddDataToRelation SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO EWA_R_FT_FUNC (FUN_ID, FT_ID) SELECT FUN_ID, @FT_ID FROM EWA_FUNCTION WHERE FUN_ID IN (@IDS_SPLIT) AND NOT FUN_ID IN( SELECT FUN_ID FROM EWA_R_FT_FUNC B WHERE B.FT_ID = @FT_ID )
SELECT * FROM EWA_FUNC_TYPE WHERE 1=1
SELECT * FROM EWA_DENY WHERE 1=1

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM EWA_FUNCTION WHERE FUN_ID = @FUN_ID

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_FUNCTION SET FUN_NAME = @FUN_NAME, FUN_TYPE = @FUN_TYPE, FUN_XML = @FUN_XML, FUN_ITEM = @FUN_ITEM, FUN_URL = @FUN_URL, FUN_MEMO = @FUN_MEMO, FUN_DENY = @FUN_DENY, fun_mdate = @sys_date WHERE FUN_ID = @FUN_ID

Set.Name: UpdateImg
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_FUNCTION SET fun_mdate = @sys_date, fun_icon =@fun_icon WHERE FUN_ID = @FUN_ID

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM V_EWA_ADM_GRP WHERE GRP_ID=@GRP_ID

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: DELETE FROM EWA_R_GRP_ADM WHERE GRP_ID=@GRP_ID AND ADM_ID=@ADM_ID AND ADM_ID>0

Set.Name: 添加全部 SQL
Set.Sql: insert into EWA_R_GRP_ADM(GRP_ID,ADM_ID) select @GRP_ID,ADM_ID FROM EWA_ADMIN WHERE NOT ADM_ID IN ( SELECT ADM_ID FROM EWA_R_GRP_ADM WHERE GRP_ID=@GRP_ID )

Set.Name: 移除全部 SQL
Set.Sql: DELETE FROM EWA_R_GRP_ADM WHERE GRP_ID=@GRP_ID AND ADM_ID>0

Set.Name: 添加部分 SQL
Set.Sql: insert into EWA_R_GRP_ADM(GRP_ID,ADM_ID) select @GRP_ID,ADM_ID FROM EWA_ADMIN WHERE NOT ADM_ID IN ( SELECT ADM_ID FROM EWA_R_GRP_ADM WHERE GRP_ID=@GRP_ID ) AND ADM_ID IN (@IDS_SPLIT)

Set.Name: 删除部分 SQL
Set.Sql: DELETE FROM EWA_R_GRP_ADM WHERE GRP_ID=@GRP_ID AND ADM_ID IN ( SELECT ADM_ID FROM EWA_ADMIN WHERE ADM_ID >0 AND ADM_ID IN (@IDS_SPLIT) )

Set.Sql: insert into EWA_R_GRP_FUN(GRP_ID,FUN_ID) select @GRP_ID, FUN_ID FROM EWA_FUNCTION WHERE NOT FUN_ID IN ( SELECT FUN_ID FROM EWA_R_GRP_FUN WHERE GRP_ID=@GRP_ID )

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM EWA_FTREE WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY FT_LVL,FT_PID

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeDelete SQL
Set.Sql: DELETE FROM EWA_FTREE WHERE FT_ID=@FT_ID

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeRename SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE EWA_FTREE SET FT_NAME=@FT_NAME WHERE FT_ID=@FT_ID

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeNew SQL
Set.Sql:
INSERT INTO EWA_FTREE(FT_PID, FT_NAME, FT_LVL, FT_OID) SELECT @FT_PID, @FT_NAME, a.FT_LVL + 1, COUNT(b.FT_OID)+1 FROM EWA_FTREE A LEFT JOIN EWA_FTREE B ON A.FT_ID=B.FT_PID WHERE A.FT_ID=@FT_PID GROUP BY A.FT_LVL;
SELECT * FROM EWA_FTREE WHERE FT_PID=@FT_PID AND FT_NAME=@FT_NAME

OnAddDataToRelation SQL

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: select ADM_ID, ADM_NAME, count(*) as CNT from EWA_ADMIN where ADM_LID = @USER_LOGIN_ID and ADM_PWD = @USER_PASSWORD AND ADM_DENY='N' GROUP BY ADM_ID, ADM_NAME;
